name: Trivia
0:
”Alexa, open trivia time”
”Start a game”
”The answer is three”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: trivia time
des:
This trivia game allows up to four players who are go through three rounds of multiple choice trivia questions (sampled from the Open Trivia Database) that get progressively harder. 

Contact me at gpsanant@gmail.com for bug reports and update ideas!
Github Repo: https://github.com/gpsanant/alexa-trivia-time
Check out https://www.npmjs.com/package/triviadb to get trivia questions for your own projects.

Have fun :)

I am not responsible for any inappropriate content or mishaps that may occur as a result of using this skill. The database is managed by PixelTail Games. If you take issue with question, please bring it up with them.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
